jobDescription: THE COMPANY Fannie Mae provides reliable, large-scale access to affordable mortgage credit in communities across our nation. We are the leading source of funding for housing in America, which means more people can buy or rent a home. We are focused on sustaining the housing recovery, improving our company, and leading change to make housing better.  Join our diverse, high-performing team and make a difference as we work together to enable access to a good home.  For more information about Fannie Mae, visit http://www.fanniemae.com/progress JOB INFORMATION
